name: Drive!Drive!Drive!
description: Drive!Drive!Drive! is a racing game unlike any other, where players must drive their cars to victory across multiple tracks at the same time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or AMD Radeon HD 3830 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz / AMD FX 4.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
